pullrequest.title: adding/moving multi-model interactions into vrc plugin

content.raw:
The drc_vehicle now has a key switch, direction switch and handbrake in addition to steering wheel, and gas and brake pedals. To see the state of these elements, echo the corresponding ros topics:
~~~
rostopic echo /golf_cart/key/state
rostopic echo /golf_cart/direction/state
rostopic echo /golf_cart/hand_brake/state
~~~

* Hand brake: 0 is disengaged, 1 is engaged.
* Key: 0 is OFF, 1 is ON, -1 is ON_FR (see KeyState enum)
* Direction: 0 is NEUTRAL, 1 is FORWARD, -1 is REVERSE (see DirectionState enum)

The vehicle currently starts with key ON and direction FORWARD and handbrake engaged. To start driving in a circle to the right, disengage the hand brake:
~~~
rostopic pub --once /golf_cart/hand_brake/cmd std_msgs/Float64 0
~~~
crank the steering wheel to -7 radians
~~~
rostopic pub --once /golf_cart/hand_wheel/cmd std_msgs/Float64 -- -7
~~~
and then stomp on the gas pedal
~~~
rostopic pub --once /golf_cart/gas_pedal/cmd std_msgs/Float64 1
~~~
To reverse directions:
~~~
rostopic pub --once /golf_cart/direction/cmd std_msgs/Int8 -- -1
~~~
